divs: sighting detailsi see u say the ufo over henderson nv was "flares" from nellis a\f base. at about 2:15 am fri morning 4\23\10 i was looking out the window unable to sleep and a huge bright light that lit the bedroom all of a sudden was overhead, and it was no flare as far as i am concerned because it went hugely fast, the time was the time it took me to say omg omg 2x it was so fast it went overhead to over the mountains. the only time i saw a light like that was phoenix because i saw the phoenix ufo. the standard af answer is always flares isn't it.
